definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

variant of 老闆|老板[lao3 ban3]

sentences.english: The big plaster-walled living room held six framed photographs.
sentences.chinese: 客厅的板墙上挂着六个相框。

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 采用双疏涂层溶液涂覆的多孔板相对好一些。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to use spine immobilization techniques in trauma victims.
sentences.chinese: 有能在创伤患者身上使用脊椎板固定技巧。

sentences.english: This black metal plate is called a collector.
sentences.chinese: 这块黑色金属板被称为集热器。

sentences.english: They call vividly this plate - type tool it the capture board .
sentences.chinese: 他们将这个板状工具形象地称之为“捕获板”。

sentences.english: You can change the size of the pasteboard in InDesign preferences.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过参数改变黏贴板的大小。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨，由透明软骨构成。

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北欧剑士装备极为精良，身穿链甲或板甲。

sentences.english: A partition surfaced in foil wall covering stands in lieu of a headboard.
sentences.chinese: 一面金属箔片饰面的隔墙替代了床头板原先的位置。

sentences.english: These levers were used to open the barrier inside the pond.
sentences.chinese: 这些操纵杆用来开放池子内部的遮挡板。

sentences.english: An integral part of any roof is its flashing.
sentences.chinese: 遮雨板是任何屋面中不可缺少的一部分。

sentences.english: Use this page to edit a column of this discussion board.
sentences.chinese: 使用此网页可编辑此讨论板的栏。

sentences.english: Foot switch board has quick lowering function when unload.
sentences.chinese: 脚踏开关板具备空载快速下降功能。

sentences.english: This new stiffened plate element has the same degree of freedom as regular plate elements.
sentences.chinese: 任意加筋板单元具有和常规板单元相同的自由度。

sentences.english: For example: Left wing number 2-fuel access door is deformed.
sentences.chinese: 左大翼二号油箱盖板变形。

sentences.english: Loosen setscrew 1 in the oil shieldplate, and remove oil shieldplate 2.
sentences.chinese: 请拧松防油板固定螺丝1，然后卸下防油板2。

definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
the feel (of sth touched with the hand)/(textiles) handle
faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
